TypeSignature.Value: public delegate int CMBufferCompare(INativeObject first, INativeObject second);
.class public auto ansi sealed CMBufferCompare extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.summary: Delegate signature to compare two CoreFoundation objects, used to sort objects in a CMBufferQueue.
Docs.returns: Zero for the same object, -1 for first being sma
Docs.remarks: The objects passed are the same ones that have been added to the CMBufferQueue object, it wont surface arbitrary objects.
